    A

    add_expense() - Method in class Classes.Expense
    Adds a new expense to the database.
    addIncome() - Method in class Classes.IncomeController
    Adds a new income record by collecting details from the user and storing them in the database.
    Analysis - Class in Classes
    The Analysis class provides functionality to analyze a user's spending habits and budget usage.
    Analysis(User, Connection) - Constructor for class Classes.Analysis
    This constructor initializes an Analysis instance by associating it with a specific user and database connection
    analytics() - Method in class Classes.Analysis
    Analyzes the logged-in user's budget and expenses to provide feedback on spending compared to budget limits for each category.
    App - package App
    This package contains the main home page of the application.
    App - Class in App
    The App.App class represents the home page for our application.
    App() - Constructor for class App.App
     
    auth - Static variable in class Classes.LoginUI
     
    AuthController - Class in Classes
    AuthController manages user authentication, account creation, and session management.
    AuthController() - Constructor for class Classes.AuthController
    Creates an AuthController object and calls setUp if no object has not been created by this class before.
    authenticate(String, String) - Method in class Classes.AuthController
    tries to log in the user with the provided credentials

    B

    Budget - Class in Classes
    The Budget class provides functionality to manage budgets in a database.
    Budget(User, Connection) - Constructor for class Classes.Budget
    This constructor initializes an Analysis instance by associating it with a specific user and database connection.
    budgetAnalysis - Class in Classes
    The budgetAnalysis class provides functionality to manage and analyze budget data.
    budgetAnalysis(Budget, Analysis) - Constructor for class Classes.budgetAnalysis
    Constructor for the budgetAnalysis class that initializes the budget, analysis, and sets up a Scanner for user input.

    C

    Classes - package Classes
    This package contains all business logic classes and handles core application functionality.
    creatBudget() - Method in class Classes.Budget
    Creates a new budget and adds it to the database.
    createReminder() - Method in class Classes.ReminderController
    Creates a new reminder by collecting details from the user and storing them in the database.
    createUser(User) - Method in class Classes.AuthController
    it tries to create an account with the provided user object

    D

    delete_expense(String) - Method in class Classes.Expense
    Deletes an expense entry from the database based on the provided expense ID.
    deleteBudget(String) - Method in class Classes.Budget
    Deletes a budget from the "budgets" table in the database based on the specified budget ID.
    deleteIncome(String) - Method in class Classes.IncomeController
    Deletes an income record from the database based on its unique ID.
    deleteReminder(String) - Method in class Classes.ReminderController
    Deletes a reminder from the database based on its unique ID.
    display_budget() - Method in class Classes.Budget
    Displays all budget entries associated with the current logged-in user.
    display_expenses() - Method in class Classes.Expense
    Retrieves and displays all expense records associated with the user's email from the expenses table.

    E

    edit_amount(String) - Method in class Classes.Budget
    Updates the amount of the specified budget.
    edit_amount(String) - Method in class Classes.Expense
    Edits the amount of an expense in the database associated with the given expense id.
    edit_budgetTable(String) - Method in class Classes.Budget
    Edits the budget table for the specified budget ID.
    edit_category(String) - Method in class Classes.Budget
    Updates the category of the specified budget.
    edit_category(String) - Method in class Classes.Expense
    Edits the category of an expense by changing it in the database.
    edit_expensesTable(String) - Method in class Classes.Expense
    Edits the expense in the "expenses" table for a specific expense ID.
    editAmount(String) - Method in class Classes.IncomeController
    Updates the amount of an existing income record in the database.
    editDate(String) - Method in class Classes.IncomeController
    Updates the date of an existing income record in the database.
    editDate(String) - Method in class Classes.ReminderController
    Updates the date of an existing reminder in the database.
    editIncome(String) - Method in class Classes.IncomeController
    Edits an existing income record by allowing the user to modify its source, amount, or date.
    editReminder(String) - Method in class Classes.ReminderController
    Edits an existing reminder by allowing the user to modify its title, date, or time.
    editSource(String) - Method in class Classes.IncomeController
    Updates the source of an existing income record in the database.
    editTime(String) - Method in class Classes.ReminderController
    Updates the time of an existing reminder in the database.
    editTitle(String) - Method in class Classes.ReminderController
    Updates the title of an existing reminder in the database.

    R

    ReminderController - Class in Classes
    Manages reminders for a user, including creating, editing, and deleting reminders in a database.

    S

    showLoginForm() - Method in class Classes.LoginUI
    This method starts the login flow by asking the user for his email and his password Note that in the case of invalid credentials this method will exit the program with status code 1
    showSignUpForm() - Method in class Classes.LoginUI
    This method starts the sign up flow by asking the user for his data (userName, email, mobilePhone, password) Note that in the case of any invalid input this method will exit the program with status code 1

    U

    User - Class in Classes
    The User class represents a user with basic information such as username, email, mobile phone number, and password.
    User(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Classes.User
     
    userName - Variable in class Classes.User
     

    V

    validate_id(String) - Method in class Classes.Budget
    Checks if an id is related to the logged-in user.
    validate_id(String) - Method in class Classes.Expense
    Validates whether the given expense id exists in the database and if it is associated with the current user's email.
    validateId(String) - Method in class Classes.IncomeController
    Validates whether an income ID exists and belongs to the current user.
    validateId(String) - Method in class Classes.ReminderController
    Validates whether a reminder ID exists and belongs to the current user.
    validateLogin(String, String) - Method in class Classes.LoginUI
    Check if the email and the password are valid for login.
    validateSignUp(String, String, String, String) - Method in class Classes.LoginUI
    Check if the user object data are valid to create an account.
